title: Test out my new paratrooper remake game
content:
Hey PCKF, Im working on a new game (not keen related, but maybe a cameo) that is a remake of the classic paratrooper/Night Raid game. The difference is this one will feature a WW2 Theme with different missions and attributes of the level. I have a 3 level demo posted up and would love some feedback. The story for the game is

"You are a freelance agent for the allied forces. Whenever a ally is in trouble, you will be there. From D-Day to Stalingrad you will fight and defend in almost all WW2 Territorys."

This 3 level demo includes the campaign in which you must protect the Malaysian President from the invading Japanese Air Force.

EDIT: Demo Removed, Full Version with Fixes, new levels and ideas coming early July[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

[img]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/790/nt45kc.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img235.imageshack.us/img235/3470/nt34uq.jpg[/img]

Please tell me what you think of the game
No its not made in KNP[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img]


Edit: whoops forgot the link

title: Re: Test out my new paratrooper remake game
content:
Woops, I suck at this game.

One thing that could be better is the soundtrack of the intro movie, there must be something better to find then this cheap tune.-----------------

title: Re: Test out my new paratrooper remake game
content:
hmm. maybe making where the gun is pointing more obvious? I kinda pointed it the wrong way at the start and lost 3 guys...
and maybe clearer instructions- I wasn't sure what to do untill recently... otherwise, good game!

[hr]

The yorp shalt inherit the mars

content:

title: Re: Test out my new paratrooper remake game
content:
